description:
Clemont`s Heliolisk resides at the Lumiose Gym where it battles Trainers under the direction of the Citroid.
It seemed very happy to see Clemont when he returned to the gym. During the Master Recognition Battle mode, Clemont told Heliolisk to come at him with all its might. It learned new battle techniques and moves from the direction of the Citroid but Clemont was able to defeat his Heliolisk to prove to the Citroid that he was the master.
name: Elezard (Citron)
